original_text: For any one of the house of Israel, or of the strangers who sojourn in Israel, who separates himself from me, taking his idols into his heart and putting the stumbling block of his iniquity before his face, and yet comes to a prophet to consult me through him, I the Lord will answer him myself.
korean_text: 이스라엘 족속과 이스라엘 가운데에 거류하는 외국인 중에 누구든지 나를 떠나고 자기 우상을 마음에 들이며 죄악의 걸림돌을 자기 앞에 두고 자기를 위하여 내게 묻고자 하여 선지자에게 가는 모든 자에게는 나 여호와가 친히 응답하여

sentences.original_text: For any one of the house of Israel
or of the strangers who sojourn in Israel
taking his idols into his heart
and putting the stumbling block of his iniquity before his face
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 죄악의 걸림돌을 자기 앞에 두는 자

sentences.original_text: and yet comes to a prophet

sentences.korean_translation: 그를 통해 나를 물으려 하는 자에게

sentences.original_text: I the Lord will answer him myself
